mapper.select:
SELECT t.*, tu.real_name as userName, tu.phone_no as phone, g.title, g.coverImg, ty.`name` as 'goodsTypeName' FROM t_pre_order t left JOIN t_goods g on t.goodsId = g.id left JOIN t_goods_type ty on g.goodsTypeId = ty.id
left join t_user_info ti on ti.id = t.userId left join t_user tu on ti.user_base_id = tu.id
WHERE 1=1
AND t.status = #{status}
AND TO_DAYS(t.createDate) = TO_DAYS(#{createDate})
ORDER BY t.status, t.createDate desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_pre_order( userId, goodsId, status, finalPrice, createDate, updateDate ) SELECT #{userId}, #{goodsId}, 0, #{finalPrice}, NOW(), NOW() FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT id FROM t_pre_order WHERE userId = #{userId} and goodsId = #{goodsId})
